title: Leading bar soap brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
There is a difference of 21.0 between the maximum Soap Bar Brand Dove and minimum Soap Bar Brand Simple.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales in million GBP for 3 number of Soap Bar Brands.
The Sales in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Soap Bar Brand Dove and lowest at Soap Bar Brand Simple.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Soap Bar Brand in the x axis and Sales in million GBP in the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million GBP 26.8 is found at Soap Bar Brand Dove and the minimum is found at Simple where Sales in million GBP is 5.8.
Soap Bar Brand  has the second highest value for Sales in million GBP.
The minimum Soap Bar Brand Simple has got 4.62 times less Sales in million GBP than the maximum Soap Bar Brand Dove.
The Soap Bar Brand Dove has 1.84 times more Sales in million GBP than average.
Summing up the values of all Soap Bar Brands, we get total 43.7.
